meanings.definition: A file format that supports both animated and static images.
meanings.sent1: I love watching gifs of cute animals on the internet.
meanings.sent2: She shared gifs of funny cartoons with her friends.
meanings.sent3: The gifs of dancing cats always make me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a series of gifs, spreading joy everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The gifs of fireworks were so colorful and bright.

meanings.definition: The act of sending or sharing animated images online.
meanings.sent1: He quickly sent gifs of birthday cakes to his friend.
meanings.sent2: We had a fun chat exchanging gifs of movie scenes.
meanings.sent3: Their conversation was filled with gifs of silly faces.
meanings.sent4: The gifs flew across the screen like shooting stars.
meanings.sent5: The gifs added humor to the group chat.
